name: ROOTOOR
description:
STORY

The game called "Rootoor" is a 2D platformer puzzle game. Your main character is a root who wants to help the great tree grow with the plant sap he collects by overcoming obstacles on the way. Players are required to have the ability to overcome challenging and mentally engaging obstacles. In the last chapter, your character comes to the great tree and leaves the essences he has collected, so the great tree grows green again and the forest life returns.

CREDITS

Game Developer : Cihat Yigit

Game Developer : Aysenur Yavuz

Game Developer-Level Designer : Selin Morali

Level Designer : Furkan Ozer

Sound Artist : Cavit Yigit
